name: Last Light (itch) (Julian Hammers)
description: Hi, I am a sologamedev and this is my first gamejamparticipation. So a tun of stuff is still missing but I hope you still enjoy it a litte :) Player controls: Spacebar, LeftShift, LeftMB, A and D. If u passed the last Level (7) you will get back in the hub no endscreen but you made it then. Hope you enjoy it a litte :) To play in browser use the LL zip the other one is a normal windows build compressed in a zip file.
